Text:
I'm happy to report that this new HoC version (at least E08, which is all I've DL'd so far) has the proper aspect ratio.

Thanks, HoC & DibyaTPB!

Interestingly, even though the source material has an actual AR of 2:1, this HoC version achieves an AR of 16:9 via letterboxing.
wtf this is worse then those with 480p!!
